metadata.name: MEADOW HORN
metadata.description:
MEADOW - HORN is a story of a dream which I saw 5 years back. Mettahorn is a beautiful mountain located in ZERMATT city of Swiss. 
This piece tells the story of passion and patience that giving up on your dreams only make it worse in life but if we stick to hope and hard working one day dreams come true. Believing in oneself is the prime path that leads to any successful story, I believed in my dream and myself that one day I would go there &saw it from my own eyes. 

It all started with WOW factor at first glance and ended with tears on my cheeks in the evening. Thanks to my friend DOM who guided me for that spot.

I spent next 4hrs to wait for the right moment and colors to capture my vision and the shot I had in my mind. I was lost in the moment and just admired this majestic mountain for hours. from the colors changing and clouds coming and going, getting darker and lights illuminating, every minute was magical and satisfying to my heart and mind.  

Every bidder & Auction winner ( Gets Special Edition Airdrop)
